item.description:
See the Academy Awards in their large auditorium on their big screen.  Free admission (they are taking donations for charity). 

Details:  Pre-show starts at 7pm and they are showing this in the bar area of the theater.  At 8:30, the Academy Awards begin on the big screen.

I have a meetup conflict but will be there at 8:30 for the awards show.  I cannot make it to the pre-show.  If you arrive at 7, please look for each other in the lobby.  I will look for you when I get there.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby - see notes below
item.name: Academy Awards - on the big screen
